thread.title: Another day, another Samsung Galaxy S8 leak. But this time, there's colors.
thread.title_full: Another day, another Samsung Galaxy S8 leak. But this time, there's colors.

author: Ariel Bogle
title: Another day, another Samsung Galaxy S8 leak. But this time, there's colors.
text:
Curious about the Samsung Galaxy S8? Let us direct you to all the leaks , leaks , and leaks .
We're just over one week away from the actual launch of the flagship smartphone, and still, the leaks keep coming.
SEE ALSO: Here's what the home screen on Samsung's Galaxy S8 might look like
On Sunday, mobile reporter Evan Blass shared some purported front and profile images of the Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8 Plus in colors he called "black sky, orchid grey and arctic silver."
Past clues suggested the phone would also come in violet, so is that what's meant by "orchid grey?" We'll have to wait and see.
Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8 Plus (top to bottom) in black sky, orchid grey and arctic silver (left to right) pic.twitter.com/ISo7W10sYV
â€” Evan Blass (@evleaks) March 19, 2017
Little more is revealed about the smartphone, but some past rumors are again confirmed: Blass' image shows a distinct lack of home button or fingerprint sensor on the front screen, for example, as well as rounded screen corners.
The Galaxy S8 will finally launch on March 29, but at this point, there may be few surprises left.
Samsung has been contacted for comment.
